formulas.description: The proposed amount of vaccine in ml based on the Animals Current Weight

fields.name: existingVaccinationAnimalName
fields.fieldText: ﻿Existing vaccination record(s) for {!recordId.Animal_Name__c}

value.stringValue: [{"apiName":"animalshelters__Date_Time_of_Action__c","guid":"column-8997","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":true,"customHeaderLabel":"Date/Time of Vaccination Due","wrapText":true,"order":0,"label":"Date/Time of Action","type":"customDateTime"},{"apiName":"animalshelters__Description__c","guid":"column-31c0","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":false,"customHeaderLabel":"","wrapText":true,"order":1,"label":"Description","type":"text"},{"apiName":"animalshelters__Previous_Action_Detail__c","guid":"column-1d9c","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":true,"customHeaderLabel":"Previous Vaccine Detail","wrapText":true,"order":2,"label":"Previous Action Detail","type":"customRichText"}]

fields.name: existingSelectionText
fields.fieldText: If no record from the above options are applicable, a new Vaccination record will be created.

fields.name: medicineDecision
fields.fieldText: Enter a new Medicine instead of choosing an existing one

fields.name: dosageText
fields.fieldText:
Based on the current weight (kg) of {!recordId.Current_Weight__c} for {!recordId.Animal_Name__c}, and the dosage / weight figure entered of {!vaccineDosagePerWeight}ml the recommended dosage is {!proposedVaccineAmount} ml


If the current weight is 0 then no calculation is available.


Accept this dosage or enter a different dosage in the Dosage Given field

fields.name: vaccinePeriodText
fields.fieldText:
How long does this vaccination protect {!recordId.Animal_Name__c}?


Enter the number of months that the next vaccination is due, from today. A future Treatment record and Task will be created for this date/time



If no follow up Vaccination is required leave the Vaccine Period field empty

subflows.description: Gets the ID for the Treatment RecordType on the Animal Action object
subflows.name: Get_RecordType
subflows.label: Get RecordType

variables.description: Data required to make new Medicine Record
variables.name: medicineRecord

variables.description: Details of the vaccination being given
variables.name: vaccinationGiven
